item.title: Former Treasury Secretary Mnuchin says Trump's top priorities will be tax cuts, Iran sanctions and tariffs
item.description: Tax cuts are 'a signature part of his program,' Mnuchin said in a "Squawk Box" interview.

item.title: Federal Reserve cuts interest rates by a quarter point
item.description: The Federal Reserve approved its second consecutive interest rate cut Thursday.

item.title: Pinterest stock plunges following weak Q4 revenue guidance
item.description: Pinterest reported third-quarter earnings on Thursday that beat on the top and bottom lines.

item.title: DoubleLine's Gundlach says expect higher rates if Republicans also win the House
item.description: DoubleLine's Jeffrey Gundlach said interest rates could shoot higher if Republicans end up controlling the House and securing a governing trifecta.

item.description: Stocks gained after a huge market rally following Donald Trump's decisive victory in the presidential election.

item.title: Affirm sees booming buy-now-pay-later growth, but stock dips after earnings

item.title: Lucid slightly tops Wall Street's third-quarter expectations amid widening losses
item.description: The company's net loss for the third quarter widened to $992.5 million compared to a loss of $630.9 million a year earlier.

item.title: Rivian lowers earnings guidance after missing Wall Street's third-quarter expectations
item.description: Rivian Automotive missed Wall Street's third-quarter expectations, including a massive difference in revenue of $116 million.
